mapper.insert: insert into t_project (id, project_name, project_type, start_time, create_time, creator_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into t_project
id,
project_name,
project_type,
start_time,
create_time,
creator_id,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{projectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mapper.update:
update t_project
project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_type = #{projectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_project set project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_type = #{projectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT t1.id id,t1.project_name project_name, t1.project_type project_type,t2.username creator_name, t1.start_time start_time FROM t_project t1, t_user t2 WHERE t1.creator_id = t2.id ORDER BY t1.start_time DESC limit #{startline}, #{pagesize}
